--- Astrotrain ---

Astrotrain comes out of high altitude orbit as he approaces his 
destination; The Dark Avian. He bursts through the clouds, and 
spirals downward toward the midrange cruiser.

He opens a commlink to the Dark Avian, "Dark Avian, Astrotrain here. 
I've arrived with Megatron and Spasstik. Preparing to land in 30 
seconds." He takes a wide berth, and comes back around slowly to 
give himself a sort of landing pad. As he approaches the ground, he 
transforms into train mode, and skids to a halt, leaving a nice 
grove along the landscape of the island.

The large train's side pannel folds downward into a ramp, and he 
awaits the exit of his passengers.
